00028 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlServerAdd::CurlServerAdd()
00029                                           :CurlSubmitForm(){
00030 
00031   GlobalURI g;
00032 
00033   xml=new xmlServerList();
00034   this->filename=g.getAdminAdress("addserver.php");
00035 
00036   // Setting the posted data key values
00037   postedData.addKey("name");
00038   postedData.addKey("ip");
00039   postedData.addKey("port");
00040   postedData.addKey("timestamp");
00041   postedData.addKey("maxClients");
00042   postedData.addKey("desc");
00043 
00044 }
00045 
00049 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlServerAdd::~CurlServerAdd(){
00050   xml->~xmlServerList();
00051   xml=NULL;
00052 }

00061 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlServerAdd::controlBefore(){
00062   bool ret=true;
00063 
00064   const char* name=postedData.getValue("name");
00065   const char* ip=postedData.getValue("ip");
00066   const char* port=postedData.getValue("port");
00067   const char* cli=postedData.getValue("maxClients");
00068   const char* errmsg;
00069 
00070   LOGI("Testing posted data :");
00071 
00072   LOGCATS("Server name : '");
00073   LOGCATS(name);
00074   LOGCATS("'");
00075   LOGCAT();
00076 
00077   LOGCATS("Server IP : '");
00078   LOGCATS(ip);
00079   LOGCATS("'");
00080   LOGCAT();
00081 
00082   LOGCATS("Server port : '");
00083   LOGCATS(port);
00084   LOGCATS("'");
00085   LOGCAT();
00086 
00087   LOGCATS("Server maxClients : '");
00088   LOGCATS(cli);
00089   LOGCATS("'");
00090   LOGCAT();
00091 
00092   // The port adress is empty
00093   if (strlen(port)==0){
00094     errmsg="The new server's listening port adress is empty";
00095     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00096     LOGW(errmsg);
00097     ret=false;
00098   }
00099 
00100   // The IP adress is empty
00101   if (strlen(ip)==0){
00102     errmsg="The new server's IP adress is empty";
00103     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00104     LOGW(errmsg);
00105     ret=false;
00106   }
00107 
00108   // The name is empty
00109   if (strlen(name)==0){
00110     errmsg="The new server's name is empty";
00111     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00112     LOGW(errmsg);
00113     ret=false;
00114   }
00115 
00116   postedData.setTimestamp("timestamp");
00117 
00118   return ret;
00119 }
